description: The audit period for usage data needs to be able to be offsettable, as systems billing from Nova usage might require a a daily period that begins and ends at local midnight instead of UTC, or a monthly billing cycle that starts on the 15th of the month instead of the 1st.

    Add adjustable offset to audit_period.
    
    Allows audit periods to be offset, so daily periods can begin at local
    midnight, instead of UTC, monthly periods can begin on the 15th
    instead of the 1st, etc.
    
    Fixes bug 948601
